name: Calculate Hours FDA IP Addressing Scheme
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA IP Addressing Scheme:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA IP scheme Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval(4+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>-1)*0.5)) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA IP scheme Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval(4+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>-1)*0.5)) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{<* Eval([IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA IP scheme Required.Yes)*>){<* Eval(4+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>-1)*0.5)) *>}{0}[ENDIF]*1.1) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
